lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry let it fly from the top of the arc, backpedaled as his record-breaking 3-ball dropped and then wildly began bobbing his head and shuffling his feet with the swagger of a two-time reigning MVP.

headline.print_headline: Sweet Shot: Stephen Curry Hits NBA-Record 13 3-Pointers
headline.main: Sweet Shot: Stephen Curry Hits NBA-Record 13 3-Pointers
